summary: Project includes admin access control so designated principals can access an admin panel to update products and details.
architectural_notes: Admin authorization is based on the caller's principal; backend must maintain an allowlist of admin principals (must match the currently logged-in principal exactly).
known_issues: Admin access error occurs when the logged-in principal is not included in the backend admin allowlist (principal mismatch between devices/sessions).
Production deployment for Version 18 initially failed with a deployment error (details unspecified).

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement/administer backend admin access so specified principals can access the admin panel to update products and details (add principal to admin list).

Ensure the Internet Identity principal `zq4an-uqz34-isqap-u5moy-4rxll-vz3ff-ndqph-gvmn5-hqe6u-o6j3v-yqe` is granted the `#admin` role in the backend access-control state so this principal can access the admin panel and perform admin-only actions (e.g., create/update products, manage news, upload logo). This must work even when no admins currently exist (i.e., bootstrap an initial admin on install/upgrade if missing).

projectName: Grant specified Internet Identity principal admin access in backend
